thread.title: Tajudeen Adepetu launches new radio station in Kano
thread.title_full: Tajudeen Adepetu launches new radio station in Kano

author: Okogba
title: Tajudeen Adepetu launches new radio station in Kano
text:
Home » Entertainment » Tajudeen Adepetu launches new radio station in Kano Tajudeen Adepetu launches new radio station in Kano On 2:33 am In Entertainment by Okogba Comments 
With about eight thriving television channels in the last 12 years, it won’t be wrong to opine that Tajudeen Adepetu, sits atop Nigeria’s biggest media conglomerate. 
Amidst heavy competition, the company with head office domiciled in Lagos, scored another first as it’s set to launch a new radio station in the northern business hub of Kano. Tajudeen Adepetu 
The name of the radio station was exclusively revealed to Potpourri On Point as, “Correct FM” with its broadcast dial as 100.7. 
Describing Correct Radio in one piece recently, a source who pleaded anonymity said it’s a Pidgin English station with state-of-the-art digital broadcasting equipments deployed in the area. 
The management of the station is said to have entered into a contract with top Nigerian artiste to record several jingles for the station. 
It would be recalled that Tajudeen Adepetu founded Soundcity TV and years after launched the Soundcity radio 98.5, Urban Radio and others which are all doing great. With the birth of Correct FM, the CEO of Consolidated Media Associates (CMA), owners of a range of TV channels that cut across television genres are indeed set for another game changing move. Okogba
